TheChromaturge:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
TheChromaturge:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

TheChromaturge:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
TheChromaturge:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
TheChromaturge:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

TheChromaturge:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
TheChromaturge:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

TheChromaturge:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
TheChromaturge:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !TheChromaturge:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

TheChromaturge:DefaultSecondMagicNumberS.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
TheChromaturge:DefaultSecondMagicNumberS.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !TheChromaturge:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
